title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5005.6 - Early service retirement reductions in the case of Tier 6 members
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5005.6 - Early service retirement reductions in the case of Tier 6 members

State Regulations

In the case of any Tier 6 member retiring for service prior
to age 63 but no earlier than age 55, the reductions in such member's service
retirement benefit otherwise computed without optional modification shall be
administered as follows: for each full month by which retirement predates age
63, such benefit shall be reduced by 6.5/1200 per month. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5005.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
